Uses of Interface
game.entity.IEntity

  • Packages that use IEntity 
    Package Description
    game.entity  
    game.entity.items  
    game.graphics  

    • Uses of IEntity in game.entity

      Classes in game.entity that implement IEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Bullet
      This class is the Bullet class.
      class  Entity
      This is the base class for all entities within the game (Player, Wall, Bullet etc.) objects of type Entity should not be created rather, its sub entities should be used.
      class  MovableEntity
      This class is an extension of Entity and provides methods that can move and rotate an entity.
      class  Player
      This class is the entity that is controlled by the player/AI it extends MovableEntity to add relevant features such as health and ammunition
      class  Wall
      This class extends Entity and does not add any extra functionality it simply sets type to be "Wall" and the correct wall sprite within the constructor

    • Uses of IEntity in game.entity.items

      Classes in game.entity.items that implement IEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HealthPickup  
      class  Item  
      class  SpeedPickup  

    • Uses of IEntity in game.graphics

      Methods in game.graphics with parameters of type IEntity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void Renderer.playAnimation​(Sprite sprite, IEntity e)
      Draws a sprite in the existing graphics context of the GameWindow
      static void Renderer.playAnimation​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Sprite sprite, IEntity e)
      Draws a sprite for an entity in a specified graphics context at any rotation angle
